medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient had sudden onset epigastric pain 2 nights ago, which has progressed to radiate to the right upper quadrant (RUQ) and right lower quadrant (RLQ). The pain has now settled out to a certain degree. It is not aggravated by movement. The patient has felt a 'lump' develop on the right side of the abdomen over the past 2 days.
